typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> custadr
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> custnames
custadr, custnames join(Column_1 == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
